keyMoments.title: Shadows Released on Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: As the sun rises over Thriller Bark, all the shadows stolen by Moria are released and return to their owners, saving the shadowless Straw Hats from disintegration.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the conclusion of Thriller Bark's primary threat - the shadow-stealing zombies and Moria's shadow collection are finally undone.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Attacks Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma arrives on Thriller Bark and launches devastating paw-shaped shockwave attacks across the island, demonstrating his destructive power.
keyMoments.significance: Thriller Bark becomes the battlefield for the climactic confrontation between Kuma and the Straw Hats.
